title: adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championship 2015 – Top 3 Men
text: Submit adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championship 2015 – Top 3 Men After a weekend of intense racing on the legendary Wellerbrücke rapids in Austria’s Ötztal valley, 27-year old Gerd Serrasolses from Sort in Spain outpaddled a show more field of the world’s finest kayakers in every single round of the competition, claiming his first and well deserved adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Champion title, ahead of David Bain from Great Britain and triple World Champion Sam Sutton from New Zealand. show less Please log in to post a comment.
